title.rendered: Bajaj FinServ collaborates with Smile Foundation by supporting its Skilling Programme STeP

content.rendered:
bAJAJ FINSERV collaborates with Smile Foundation by supporting its SKILLING PROGRAMME STEP

Bajaj FinServ, a prominent financial services company based in Pune, actively contributes to Smile Foundation’s skilling programme, STeP through its foundation. The collaborative project was initiated in September 2022, focusing on establishing 10 skilling centers in Pune, with Bajaj FinServ providing substantial support. As of today, the program has successfully trained and empowered over 700 beneficiaries, with approximately 500 individuals securing employment upon completion of their training.

Renowned as a Core Investment Company, Bajaj FinServ holds a distinguished position as a leading promoter of financial services in India. With an impressive track record, it has served over 100 million customers, solidifying its status in the industry.
